name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: So after receiving treatment, the déjà rêvé and panic attacks have dramatically reduced in frequency. Ironically, this happened concurrently with the start of the pandemic. I think I would have literally gone insane if I went into the pandemic without medical help 🥲 woo!

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: Every time tho, it would cause a panic attack and I’d have to find a way to calm myself down. The immense, overwhelming feeling of impending doom was so disruptive, I couldn’t continue existing like that without medical intervention.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I would be going about my usual business when a specific occurrence would trigger a flashback of dreams I’ve experienced starting with the triggered moment. It was always embarrassing since there’s literally no way to explain the sensation without sounding insane

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
this will be one of my more off-my-rocker tweets

before I managed to secure medical treatment for my panic disorder (new year 2020), I would frequently have panic attacks due to extreme, vivid episodes of déjà rêvé predicting an impending apocalypse https://t.co/lCI1y3J3Al

/4

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
Just as you would have photos of family and friends on a shelf, include photos of yourself in areas you spend most time. Personally, the visual cue helps me remember I’m just as human as anyone. The person in that photo relies on me for happiness 
3/

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
As time moves forward and responsibilities pile, my energy tends to focus on whatever I can see most often day to day. “Out of sight out of mind” is a huge hurdle when you have ADHD, and this includes my own needs when I become hyper fixated on work or games 
2/

name: M. A. Zavala

tweet:
ok this is gonna sound like a weird life tip, but if you’re someone like me who tends to dissociate and neglect themselves if left to your own devices for too long: try putting up photos of yourself where you can see them often

tweet: @JLHGameArt *in regards to my personal experience: I didn't have a safety net to rely upon, so there was a bit of survivalist desperation behind my energy to land a job. That with the mountain of debt I was carrying led me to become a workaholic, unfortunately. Double edged sword

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: @JLHGameArt I think part of game dev is to have a solid self-awareness of your own level of skill, an open mind to feedback, and the ability to filter irrelevant critique from useful advice. If educators fail to nurture this, they're failing those students regardless of craftmanship

name: M. A. Zavala

name: M. A. Zavala

tweet: It’s such a weird experience, honestly. It’s like parts of myself that were lost in an abyss are returning to the current day and seeing my life as it is now with fresh eyes. And in a way, makes me feel so grateful for what I have today.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: Though I wouldn’t say I’m a huge fan of 00’s rock (besides QoTSA), Reviving these tracks to the front of my thoughts feels like stitching together a torn quilt of my personality. I went through a lot back then, and so many memories were locked away until now

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: What started as an in-joke by listening to the 00’s Spider-man soundtrack turned into rediscovery of music I didn’t even realize shaped a lot of my pre-teen days. Most of these songs near the end I half expect to hear “this is 96.1 ALL ROCK ALL DAY”

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
Between months of feeling dissociated from the world during this pandemic, I’ve been finding small windows of self-exploration and learning more about who I am 

I’m reconnecting with parts of myself that were lost during traumatic moments, which I didn’t think was possible

name: M. A. Zavala

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I’m not sure if I have anything productive to add to this, I just wanted to add in my experiences and how I’m forever confused by people’s lack of empathy or humanity in the workplace

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: People will just treat you like trash if they perceive you as “low skill” enough to be employed in a service role, and I’ll never understand it. I really don’t. I still don’t understand office politics for the life of me.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: When she was caught yelling at me in front of a customer, that customer was incredibly kind enough to call and report her to corporate, and she was immediately removed from my store. I’ll always be thankful for that.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: At Gamestop, we had a manager from a different branch swapped to my store one day. I don’t know WHAT it was about me but she did not. like. me. For no discernible reason. And if you’re in a low ring of rank, people will just treat you like shit because they can???

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: Fortunately, and sometimes unfortunately, I have a tough time ignoring my spidey-senses for injustice, so the first opportunity that came around where I could quit without feeling bad about it, I jumped ship. Then it was Blockbuster until they shut down. Then Gamestop.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: When I dropped out of college (MICA), I took up a “low skill” job as a retail associate for an airport souvenir shop. Customers were never rude, but my manager treated me like I was plain stupid for no other reason than my ADHD symptoms. I was bewildered by it!

name: M. A. Zavala

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
The entertainment industry, particularly games, is so small, yet I feel like I’ve heard about so many leaving their careers due to burn out. They burn through their chaos so quickly, all in the name of capitalist endeavors 

I don’t want to be a statistic, I want to thrive

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
What if we were able to focus on meaningful personal work or family life an extra day out of the week? Or perhaps just rest while the kids are at school? 

How many of us would feel less like they’re on the brink of shutting down and leaving the industry altogether?

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I can’t speak for other fields, but I reckon most professionals agree with me. Fridays become a joke, literally and figuratively, as workers tend to work slowly or spend the time on extracurriculars. We joke about the weekend, but what if Fridays were spent with more intention?

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: So when we find ourselves lucky to work with a crunch-free studio, the five day work week is seen as a reasonable pace. I disagree, but mostly from my perspective as an artist. It’s physically impossible for me to give consistent work under the current industry status quo

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: During college, I went on a crusade against crunch culture by tackling the harm art schools do to students before they even enter the industry. As students, we’re groomed to expect brutal hours. A crunch-free studio is seen like a unicorn rather than the lowest standard

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
As it is, I must wear copper lined gloves to keep up my daily work without wearing down my hand. I’ve gone through so many gloves lmao 

I want to continue painting for the rest of my life, but if I’m feeling this way at the start of my 30s, what does that say about my future?

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I’m afraid I will inevitably burn out during my prime if I attempt to bring my best every week as I do now. The holidays weren’t enough time to recover, honestly. I love my job almost more than anything, but as Heimerdinger would say, those who shine brightest often burn fastest

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: Someday within my career I hope the studio I work with changes to four day work weeks. Creative workers expend an intense amount of energy to produce quality art within profitable deadlines. With the current pace, even without crunch, it feels unsustainable.

name: M. A. Zavala

tweet:

I have an amazing life with amazing people lifting me up, and I want to intentionally exist and actively appreciate all I have each day

tweet:
by something I mean a part of me that’s being neglected 

usually I’m either dwelling on unhappy things, or I’m not eating enough. Reminding myself that the anxiety is usually a product of something like that helps me rebalance. It’s taken like… 20 years to get to this point lol

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I’m learning every time I feel anxious, it’s my body’s way of telling my mind there’s something that needs my attention within the present moment

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: Overall I would say the team behind the characters succeeded with pushing diversity in the faces and making them all feel appealing. Mylo and Claggor definitely deserve more praise in this regard. Getting a character like Mylo to feel young and represent his strengths is A+ work

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: less pronounced nose bridges is also quite complex when creating the sculpted, planar feel in faces. Most of the characters in Arcane have quite defined bridges. It still works, but pushing the diversity even further with those small details can make an impact.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
this is an idle thought regarding the vis dev of Arcane 

I would like to see more characters with soft features like Claggor. Tho I’m head over heels for the stylization, it’s even more impressive when round faces fit among the chiseled. It’s harder than it looks!

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
“small artists” need to ask themselves “what’s the bottom line priority for me?” 

is it followers?
is it commissions? 
is it employment? 

each of these have unique priorities that require research, work and time. If you feel that’s not true, you won’t sustain long term results

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
if someone’s goal is to overcome the social media algorithm, then it makes the most sense to research the algorithm priorities and make it your job to fulfill the demands 

even if others share your work, those RTs don’t mean retention or sustainability

tweet: these are the colors I chose for this example, feel free to test this out with your own studies, or try different saturation levels! I chose these as an attempt to create as much color dissonance possible to allow maximum map interaction with the value range https://t.co/nrpfwy1b0s

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: Using this route, you can work in black and white values underneath the gradient map, and your eye will catch the value changes much more quickly with the map interaction. I'm going to test this today with some of my work!

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: You can use this method while painting if you set your eyedropper tool to "Current Layer" or "Current & Below, no Adjustments" if you have previously set adjustment layers already within your process painting

name: M. A. Zavala

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
there’s two things that I’ve been doing lately to get my sketches rolling quickly:

1. reduce contrast and value range with curves/levels 
2. use filter -> maximum or minimum to emphasize a range of values 

repeating these two steps between painting gets that clean sculpt feel!

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I’m not sure why I’m putting this out in public on twitter. Maybe I’m just accepting how things have been going. I’m slowly starting to feel better, especially now that I’ve cleaned up my appearance. I even took a smiling selfie for the first time in months lol

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: It just really sucks that I’ve been missing out on my own days of personal success and experiences. From the outside, it looks like I’m living the dream, but in reality the most I do is take a small walk and make measly efforts to clean the messes in the house

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: Thankfully, with the growth of our concept team, I’ve been able to ease my mind and focus more on taking steps to improve my personal life again. Navigating work responsibilities with my ADHD has been so taxing, but I care so much so I’ve been overexerting myself to stay afloat

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: The bit about a design for other artists to replicate is especially important when aiming for consistency. The simpler the design, the easier it is to create guides for your team to understand. A cool design is useless if you're the only team member who can pull it off

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
things i've learned on the job: #14857

concept art isn't purely about communicating cool designs. A good concept artist considers production resources, ease of replicating the design through multiple hands, and reusability

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
I don’t directly recommend this next bit, but it helped me in its own way 

Over the summers, I was able to pay the bills by figure modeling for local studios. I learned what poses work well for drawings, which I internalized as part of my understanding of forms in physical space

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I was extremely fortunate enough to take classes in both traditional and digital sculpting, and it made me fall in love with expressing form. This is all just old student work, but the experience contributed to my understanding of painting forms that feel “sculpted” https://t.co/11WVjpOe6t

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
even though I plan to post some more useful tips for painting techniques I use in my process, there’s one thing I think helped me the most

If you have the opportunity, I strongly encourage playing with clay. Just spending time with creating sculpts opened my eyes to so much

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
If you don’t have access or safe resources to visit a live figure drawing studio, I recommend using sites like Line Of Action to practice timed pose sessions https://t.co/npVd4TpEDM 

Remember, It’s less about accuracy as it is about capturing the flow. 

I hope this is helpful!

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: The goal is to exercise your muscle memory for expressing form. Repetitively sketching the human figure quickly will eventually start to create familiar patterns your brain will latch onto, which allows early stages of character work to feel easier as you go. 2/

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: No worries! If it’s the early stuff that gets you, it might help to practice with fast pace gesture drawing sessions. 30 sec - 2 min poses to sketch means it’s less about the construction and more about exploring the core of the action however necessary 1/ https://t.co/6FmoeVhCel

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: For me, working while under-rested means I'm not allowing enough time to let new information digest into long-term memory. Working off short-term memory over extended periods of time will exhaust you faster than Working with a restful balance.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
The fact that I felt I was doing my best work the week before my PTO is laughable now lol 

There were so many simple mistakes I was overlooking just from deficient rest. They are minor mistakes, but enough of them add up and impact the overall quality of work.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: Taking a vacation, even just a day off from work, is like refreshing the RAM of your brain. You need to allow your mind to rest and refresh itself to continue absorbing and applying new information as efficiently as possible. Schedule rest into your workflow, it's a necessity.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: @nebelungtwt @mykola I eventually learned I was thoroughly emotionally neglected back then, which increased the side effects. After years of psychotherapy, the meds don’t have a depression to exacerbate like before. I’m treated for panic disorder alongside ADHD, which seems to create a good balance

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: @nebelungtwt @mykola When I was first diagnosed in ‘07, they started me on 20mg adderall XR. At the time the side effects of depression were too much, so they tried Ritalin, then Vyvanse, all at 20mg. Couldn’t handle it. I dropped the meds until ‘17, starting low at 5mg. Living my best today, 15mg

name: M. A. Zavala

tweet: The other important factor I want to point out: I probably wouldn’t have improved this quickly if we weren’t WFH and low on social opportunities. I’ve been painting every weekend like a loon, on top of my daily work. It’s not the healthiest lifestyle :/

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:

It’s been brutal some days, but when I post my latest and see this reception, something is paying off lol

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: The GOP are chipping away at voting rights alongside these draconian laws. Most families can’t just get up and move away, so we have to fight back. Strategic organizing is no longer optional, it’s imperative. There’s no chill when it comes to getting out the vote.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
As a fully adult woman today, after years of therapy, I have a better hold on my self respect and presence. I still practically refuse to wear skirts, but I love exploring makeup trends and enjoying my own feminine appeal. 

Anyway. We need to help the women in Texas.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I still struggle to hold emotional space for myself today. I was raised to always defer to stronger voices around me. I was told being a mother is the most sacred thing a woman could do in her life. That shit burned into my thoughts and made me fear puberty

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I still have moments of gender dysphoria because of the way girls and women were regarded in the Catholic church. I didn’t feel comfortable wearing more “revealing” clothing until my late 20s because of traumatic shaming. Having a curvy body meant more responsibility to hide it

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: When we all cried in despair after the 2016 election, that wasn’t a hyperbolic gesture.

name: M. A. Zavala

The biggest benefit of working underneath a curves adjustment layer: 

If you struggle with keeping your values within a certain range while you're painting, the adjustment layer gives you a sort of "bumper" guide to keep your values from going too dark or light

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: @Jauxiles thanks for the kind words. I just feel awful for coming across like I'm making excuses. I never seem to have energy time for friends, and when I see posts about being a "user" or someone who climbs over others, I always worry if I've ever accidentally done this😢

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: Anyway that’s enough rambling about my insecurities. I hope my friends are all doing well, and I want you all to know I’m rooting for all of you even if we haven’t spoken in months. You’re all so inspiring. Thanks for reading my word boogers

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: If wholesome memes sufficed for expressing my love for my friends, I would feel a little relief. But it still hurts that I haven’t been able to give more of myself to my community outside of my immediate world. I’m just clinging onto as much normalcy as I can.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I tend to overcompensate for all this by giving the people in my daily routines high amounts of energy and focus, which can seem odd once I shift jobs, social circles, etc and suddenly drop most/all contact. Its like having no peripheral energy

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I’ve always felt insecure about coming across as using people as ladders in my career because of my social anxiety struggles, which has now compounded into a debilitating anxiety again. I promise it’s never my intention, and I’m sorry if I’ve ever left anyone feeling this way

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I’ve basically been holding my little world together with rickety mental scaffolding as I try to navigate remote work demands during pandemic conditions. I just have no energy for full meaningful conversations and it kills me. I feel awful because I sincerely care

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I think about my friends every day, and some days I wish it was just more acceptable to write letters rather than communicate with instant chats. I want to be there for my friends, but I know I can’t spread myself too far from my immediate routines or I fall apart quickly

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: With my successes at work have come some heavy twangs of guilt for neglecting DMs and calls from friends. I’ve never been more flakey in my life. I’ve been trying to reflect why I can’t balance both, which led to strong speculations about undiagnosed autism

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: When the pandemic really went into full swing, I was also flung into a high demand position at work that took most of my energy every day. This meant even less energy to navigate my social anxieties, so I started isolating exponentially over the following weeks

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I’ve always struggled with social anxiety since I have high tendencies to space out in conversations, forget important personal details, and lack enough initiative to be the person that reaches out. This never meant I don’t care about my friends.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
I feel very compelled to put this in the open since I’m constantly wracked with guilt over it 

Since the pandemic began, I’ve been extremely poor with maintaining contact with close friends and family that don’t have some direct cross into my daily routines.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: @tha_rami It’s not so much a career failure as an early lesson in work life balance. I’ve become a huge advocate for living with ADHD and accepting a work balance that accommodates those struggles. Accepting reality allowed me to form the best version of it for myself

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: @tha_rami It took self-acceptance of my untreated ADHD for me to get back on my feet. I put my mental health first, which properly prepared me to do better for the next gig. Once I eventually landed full time at Disney, I immediately jumped back into therapy and meds for treatment. 2/2

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: @tha_rami Jumping straight into freelance for Blizzard right out of college when I was already burnt out from overextending myself with coursework. I ended up burning out a few months into it, contracts weren’t renewed, and I sunk into a burnout depression for a few months. 1/2

name: M. A. Zavala

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: From there I was passed to a incubation team working on some secret project stuff, so that's the end of my public concept work with Blizzard. My NDA portfolio eventually helped me find more work from there, until I eventually started full time working with the Disney mobile team!

name: M. A. Zavala

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ

name: M. A. Zavala

name: M. A. Zavala

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: all I’m saying is do the tough, dirty work of research and visual development before you ask a crew of artists to bring your vision to life. create a prototype of your flavor before asking your chefs to cook. give your musicians a riff before they clash from playing out of tempo

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: think about all the information left out of movie trailers! or a movie poster! could you deconstruct a whole team’s work just from a few out of context stills? could you create a stylized cat consistent with the stylized humans from a youtube clip? can your team do it??

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
think about it this way 

if your style guide only consists of screenshots of a game you’re familiar with, but let’s say your concept team is not, you’re leaving SO MUCH face value interpretation to your team.

you’re forcing everyone to become mini art directors

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
creating stylized work is such a complex endeavor, I fear any art director that thinks you can just loosely reference a game for a “style guide” and call it a day 

when you’re stylizing visuals, you’re reinventing an entire world. you’re playing god with your eyeballs

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
If you can’t articulate why a certain style you enjoy works, you won’t be able to utilize it for your own work. 

If you can’t translate a style to work in different contexts via props, buildings, faces, but you REALLY like it in some other game… you have some studying to do

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
ONE MORE THING 

If you enjoy a certain style already out in the world and you’re thinking “we’ll just use these screenshots as our style guide” I want you to grab the nearest blunt object and smack yourself across the face 

DEFINE 👏 YOUR 👏 STYLE 👏 IN 👏 YOUR 👏 OWN 👏 WORDS

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: good morning to the construction machinery that sounds like a robot sneezing near my window

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
quick, fast and efficient concept art only works if you have a guide that the whole team can reference through the pipeline. Otherwise, you’re gonna have to repeat yourself A LOT 

Save yourself from early onset arthritis and make a guide. for the love of all that is holy.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
This might sound obvious but it’s always worth repeating 

If you want to make a consistent stylized project, it’s imperative you establish a well defined style guide first. Otherwise you’re setting yourself up for painting every 👏 concept 👏 piece 👏 and you will die https://t.co/4OuvmDd5k8

name: M. A. Zavala

Game dev work is impossible without empathetic communication, but especially so if you’re working remotely.

7/

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
I used to get so full of anxiety during waiting times when applying to studios. Now I realize the people hiring are also juggling their tasks, and sometimes things just take time to process! 

6/

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
Most factors that go into a final round decision are outside of the candidates’ control, so don’t stress if you end up not landing the gig. More likely than not, your name will stay close by in the recruiting database the next time we need to fill a role again.

5/

name: M. A. Zavala

tweet:

4/

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
Just because you’ve been rejected during one round of hiring doesn’t mean that door is closed to you forever. Sometimes schedules aren’t compatible, or a project has different needs at the time. It’s always worth giving it a shot again in the future. 

3/

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:

2/

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: I can’t give a thread on how to spot harmful nuanced behaviors, but documentation saved my little game dev baby butt in the past and it can save yours.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: Most of the discussions surrounding the lawsuit have been about sexual harassment issues, but emotional abuse from managers is just as prevalent. Being gaslit into doubting your own self worth is extremely tricky to spot. Documenting your day-to-day will help with this.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: If there’s a pattern of behavior happening, ie emotional abuse or sexual harassment, HR will be looking for consistency across all reports. This is why journaling your experience from the moment makes a difference. If you’re in good hands, they will make a change.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: When I say document, I don’t mean explicitly record your private chats as that’s not legal everywhere. Write down notes of the highlights, or just keep a journal about your experience from that day. Your thoughts from the moment itself have more leverage as time moves on.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
Just woke up and I’m still in that groggy phase where I speak my mind so here I go 

Document everything. Not just your art process. Work meetings. 1-on-1’s. Manager chats. Everything. 

If there’s abuse happening at your workplace, this is your only leverage to make a case.

name: M. A. Zavala

tweet: @jam_etc as mentioned already, try to sleep/rest as much as you can over the following day! And hydrate hydrate hydrate 💦

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
the increase of time constraints and responsibilities makes things much more clear when I need to take a break 

if I start to feel even slightly sluggish, I drop the pen and walk away. more likely than not, a quick stretch and breath will help more than pushing through it

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
when work starts to kick into high gear, it becomes much more apparent how much we must maintain work life balance 

I can't maintain the energy or concentration necessary to fulfill my responsibilities if I don't supplement it with healthy mental rest and ample recovery

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
Save a concept artist. Give them a visual bible. 

Not screenshots of other games.
Not a monologue explanation. 

A clear, well thought out visual bible.

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
Without a visual target, everyone down the pipeline is left to use their best subjective judgments of what will work, and not everyone will always agree 

When you have a visual bible, you can provide clarity to fill the imagination when translating a concept’s intentions

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: A concept artist uses their tools to convey a design representative of an existing visual target. Without a visual target, you’re basically throwing spaghetti at the wall hoping eventually someone catches a noodle for you

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
Concept art is not Illustration 

However, if your visual goals are not clearly defined and established before you begin production, your concept artists will inevitably be stuck illustrating their work to convey what should have been done before everything

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
you can never ask too many questions when developing a look from scratch. the sooner you ask, the sooner you’ll find solutions to keep your workflow smooth as silk. 

also document the fuck out of everything

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: for example, if you’re simplifying the look of fabrics, how do you wish the fabric to behave? does it always crumple in triangles, or can it also swoosh? do different materials behave in the same language? what unifies them together?

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
impulsive midnight art tip 

make every choice with clear intent and purpose. it’s easy to take the small details for granted, but if you’re developing a style that needs to exist and function, defining the small things will make the larger things much easier to fill

name: M. A. Zavala

tweet:
So if you're feeling sluggish with work, or you have that icky plateau feeling with your latest art, step away for a little bit if you can! 

This seems common sense, but as someone who can hyperfixate for days and weeks on end, I know the external reminder can help sometimes

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet: Of course this is just my experience, everybody responds differently to stepping away from the canvas, but it truly helped me to refresh my eyes and take in different experiences for a little bit. I can see my mistakes more quickly today, which is a pleasant surprise!

name: M. A. Zavala
description: Senior Concept Artist @UnbrokenStudios | BLM | 💖💜💙 | she/her | ASD & ADHD | music hobbyist | prev @Disney x @JamCityHQ
tweet:
Friendly PSA for those that can afford to take a small few days off from work: TAKE A BREAK 

I was nervous about how I'd jump back into painting after a week of not even touching my cintiq, but turns out I'm working twice my usual speed now that I'm refreshed. H'YUK

Beforehand, you're excited and idealize it. 
During, you ask yourself "why did I want this." 
Afterwards, the dopamine and pride you feel makes you want to do it again.
